description: Harvest Punch is the best Thanksgiving cocktail. It's light, refreshing, and perfect for the holiday season. With just a few ingredients, you can whip up this tasty drink in minutes!
name: Harvest Punch

recipeInstructions.name: Add the ice to a punch bowl. Pour in apple cider and vodka, then top it off with ginger beer. Add sliced apples and oranges on top of ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the ice to a punch bowl. Pour in apple cider and vodka, then top it off with ginger beer. Add sliced apples and oranges on top of ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Finish it off by adding cinnamon sticks and serve them alongside the drink!
recipeInstructions.text: Finish it off by adding cinnamon sticks and serve them alongside the drink!

recipeInstructions.name: Using an orange slice, wet the rim of glasses, then dip into cinnamon sugar, turning to coat. Serve punch in rimmed glasses.
recipeInstructions.text: Using an orange slice, wet the rim of glasses, then dip into cinnamon sugar, turning to coat. Serve punch in rimmed glasses.
